replies.body:
Just as the Avicore Update rolled over, Aagrant told me on Skype that he didn't want to come back because he felt that everyone was going against him. I tried to convince him to come back and he said that "he'd give it a chance."

I saw him in-game a few times but I doubt he's coming back to the forums.
replies.body_tagged:
Just as the Avicore Update rolled over, Aagrant told me on Skype that he didn't want to come back because he felt that everyone was going against him. I tried to convince him to come back and he said that "he'd give it a chance."

I saw him in-game a few times but I doubt he's coming back to the forums.
